interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: 4 Point Eyebrow Pen, Micro Ink Brow Pen Waterproof Eyebrow Pencil With Micro-Fork Tips for Daily Natural Eye Brown Makeup Review Date: 2020/07/14 Store: Lunana Beauty Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Lunana Beauty', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '2 x 1.2 x 0.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '763944352085'} Review Text: My hair is dyed an unusual color, and the dark gray pen looks so much better than the common brown one.
It’s just as easy to use as any other tattoo eyebrow pens, plus it’s waterproof.
I also received several other eyebrow tools that came with it.
It’s a terrific deal that’s really useful! Review Title: Great 🤗 Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Banana Comb Hair Clips - Set of 4 Locking Clasp Hairclips The Paragon {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.4 x 2.6 x 0.9 inches; 0.81 Ounces'} These work only if one has fine hair. I have shoulder length, really thick hair, and the first time I tried one of them, it totally broke in half. So now thy’ll go in the “X-Mas Socking Stuffer” bag. Too Frail New Look - The Fay Farm's Organic Healing Hemp Lotion - 8 oz. The Fay Farm, LLC {'Brand': 'The Fay Farm, LLC', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '8 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.5 x 2.5 x 5.75 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '853618002405'} I’ve had severe back aches for about 3 years now-sometimes where my back freezes up and I can’t even stand up. I’m sick of pills,so when I came upon this lotion, it was really amazing. I didn’t realize what it was advertised for, so I just thought it’s for relieving pain. My “mistake” ended up freeing me of muscle pain and back cramps. It smells great too (like lavender, even though there’s none in it).
It’s like a masseus in a bottle. Great for Muscle Aches Soft & Dri Womens Soft scent Antiperspirant 3.5 fl oz/ 102g (Pack of 3) Soft & Dri {'Brand': 'Soft & Dri', 'Unit Count': '3.5 Ounce', 'Item Volume': '3.5 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 5.5 x 1.9 inches; 10.4 Ounces'} I’ve been using this product since 1978, and I was totally bummed out when it was removed off the shelves.
It really keeps you dry, and smells so good.
I’m just glad to be able to buy it here. Great 👍🏻 VILLATONE Large Makeup Mirror with Lights and Magnification (Detachable Spot 10X Cosmetic Mirror). 360° Rotation. Touch Screen Brightness Dimming. Lighted Vanity Mirror for Make Up with LED Lighting VILLATONE {'Brand': 'VILLATONE', 'Shape': 'Rectangular, Round', 'Frame Material': 'Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS)', 'Mounting Type': 'Countertop Mount, Tabletop Mount', 'Special Feature': 'magnifying, dimmable, lighted', 'Product Dimensions': '10 x 6 x 1 inches; 1.21 Pounds'} This is the correct size, maneuverable, and sheds enough light to put on your makeup.
I didn’t receive the usb cord that was supposed to come with it, so I’ve had to use batteries, but that works as well. It’s bright 💁🏻‍♀️ 4 Point Eyebrow Pen, Micro Ink Brow Pen Waterproof Eyebrow Pencil With Micro-Fork Tips for Daily Natural Eye Brown Makeup Lunana Beauty {'Brand': 'Lunana Beauty', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '2 x 1.2 x 0.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '763944352085'} My hair is dyed an unusual color, and the dark gray pen looks so much better than the common brown one.
It’s just as easy to use as any other tattoo eyebrow pens, plus it’s waterproof.
I also received several other eyebrow tools that came with it.
It’s a terrific deal that’s really useful! Great 🤗
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Focus**: The user has thick shoulder-length hair and seeks durable hair accessories suitable for their hair type.
- **Product Durability Concern**: They emphasize quality and robustness in hair and beauty products, showing a negative perception toward frail items.
- **Gift Consideration**: A tendency to repurpose unsatisfactory products as thoughtful gifts reflects a considerate approach to gifting.
- **Rating Tolerance**: Their critical eye is clear in reviews, with an average rating reflecting durability concerns and performance expectations.
- **Review Behavior**: They actively detail their experiences with products, especially regarding effectiveness and user satisfaction, aiming to inform potential buyers.
- **Wellness Product Interest**: Recently, they explored wellness products targeting muscle pain, favoring high-rated items with therapeutic benefits.
- **Personal Care Products Insight**: Loyalty to reliable personal care items is evident, as is delight in effective, pleasantly-scented solutions, coupled with disappointment over discontinued favorites.
- **Makeup Accessories**: Their purchase of functional and bright makeup tools showcases a preference for practicality, further demonstrated by their enthusiasm for a recently acquired waterproof eyebrow product that enhances their makeup routine.

Overall, the user prioritizes durability and functionality across hair, personal care, and makeup products, remaining discerning regarding quality and performance while actively engaging in thoughtful product reviews.
